useCase.name: Create New Robot Type

preconditions.precondition: Actor indicates the creation of a new robot type

useCase.trigger: User requests to create a new robot type

mainSequence.step: Actor requests data for the new robot type
Container provides data for the new robot type
Actor sends the data for the new robot type
Container sends POST request to API for creating the new robot type
API responds with success/failure message for creating the new robot type
Container forwards the success/failure message to the Actor
